extendedInfo.description: Make your own personnel Christmas greeting card and share it with your family or friends. Take a photo of your loved ones and create a wonderful or funny Christmas postcard. Write a funny text or a more romantic text and share it on Facebook or mail. If you can't come up with a text the app will automatically suggest one for you!You can use this photo effect app to generate greeting cards by easily changing the picture or text. You can even help you children to create a letter for Santa Claus. If you like other photo booth or photo frame apps you will definitely like my Christmas card for making hilarious pictures. The background of the card features a beautiful Christmas tree made out of stars. No snow though.How to use the app:1. Choose an photography. Use the camera or choose existing image from phone gallery.2. Use the photo editor to adjust the image by moving, zooming and rotating the image. The camera effect is black and white. The photo editor does not include warp and distortion of face.3. Tap the text to change the texts on the poster.4. Save and/or share on Facebook, mail, etc.If you experience any technical issues, please contact us at support@flisko.com. Please include app name, version, device information and screenshot if possible. Like us on Facebook to get exclusive news!!http://www.facebook.com/fliskoapps
